entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:19 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
